name: Quatro Luzes
description: Quatro Luzes (from the Portuguese, Four Lights) is a 3D platformer game, where you have to swap between 4 worlds to proceed, using your brain and skill. You play as Atlas, a girl that lived in a blank, lifeless world, in her adventure to discover 4 colorful new ones!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2Duo (or Dual Core) Graphics: Geforce GTS 250 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 375 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Quad core / AMD Phenom X4 and higher Graphics: Geforce 6600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 375 MB available space
